title: OnOptions
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Diane Keaton’s quiet activism helped preserve these Los Angeles landmarks
items.description: "I’ll never understand why architecture is considered a second cousin to painting and film," Diane Keaton wrote in 2008.

items.title: Diane Keaton, Oscar-winning star of ‘Annie Hall’ and ‘The Godfather,’ dies at 79
items.description: People Magazine reported Saturday that she died in California with loved ones, citing a family spokesperson.

items.title: Why Your Workforce Strategy Must Go Global

items.title: Silicon Valley tech boss Marc Benioff says he’s all for Trump sending troops to San Francisco since ‘we don’t have enough cops’
items.description: “We don’t have enough cops, so if they can be cops, I’m all for it,” Benioff told The New York Times on Friday.

items.title: Strategic Objectives Alone Won’t Drive Change. Here’s the Value in Specific, Measurable Actions

items.title: At this rate, the price of gold could soar to $10,000 per ounce in just three years
items.description: "If it continues on its current path, it could reach $10,000 before the end of the decade."
